## Dump the Raw MBR in Hex

>> mbr_inspect_v3$ ./mbr_inspect test/disk.img  --raw

MBR successfully read from test/disk.img
Boot Signature: 0xAA55
Partition 1:
	Bootable: YES
	Type: 0x83
	Start LBA: 2048
	Sectors: 409600
	CHS Start: C=0 H=0 S=2
	CHS End: C=831 H=0 S=62
